client.application

Class FileAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.application.FileAccess

  • public class FileAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to handle the IO operations to get images and save/load games.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileAccess()
      Constructs a new FileAccess object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileAccess

        public FileAccess()
        Constructs a new FileAccess object. This loads all images to memory so they can be quickly accessed later.
